articles.author: Philip Bump
articles.title: The Soleimani aftermath pivots to a key Trump talking point: Democrats are traitors
articles.description: If Nikki Haley is the thermometer for the GOP that she hopes to be, it's a grim moment.
articles.content:
Appearing on the prime time Fox News show of Trump supporter Sean Hannity, Haley dismissed the idea that the killing of Iranian Quds Force commander Maj. Gen. Qasem Soleimani was lamented by anyone except for American Democrats.
Youre not hearing any of the … [+6101 chars]

articles.author: Kayla Epstein
articles.title: One of Trump’s most vocal critics on Iran? Fox News’s Tucker Carlson. - The Washington Post
articles.description: One of Trump’s most vocal critics on Iran? Fox News’s Tucker Carlson. The Washington Post View full coverage on Google News
articles.content:
Carlson is not the only critic of Trumps decision, but he is one of the loudest voices on the right. And he has done so on a network that has featured some of the presidents most loyal defenders such as Sen. Lindsey O. Graham (R-S.C.). 
Despite his aversion … [+3961 chars]

articles.author: Ilan Ben Zion | AP
articles.title: Orthodox women seek bigger role as Jews end Talmud cycle
articles.description: As Orthodox Jews worldwide conclude a grueling marathon of daily Talmud study, a growing number of Israeli women are joining the effort, spotlighting collapsing gender barriers in the male-dominated community This week, Jews around the world celebrated the en…
articles.content: The Babylonian Talmud is a vast, rambling text written mostly in Aramaic that encompasses law codes, anecdotes, mysticism, customs, disputations and aphorisms, and serves as the cornerstone of Orthodox Jewish practices. The 63-volume, 2,711-page compendium of… [+5063 chars]

articles.author: Greg Sargent
articles.title: McConnell’s coverup for Trump cannot make this one thing disappear
articles.description: The GOP whitewashing is getting worse -- and more absurd.
articles.content:
Thats ridiculous enough on its own. But at the core of this emerging defense is another absurdity so spectacular that its almost impossible to do it justice with mere words.
It is a reasonable possibility that Bolton has a level of direct knowledge of Trumps… [+4623 chars]

articles.author: Isabelle Khurshudyan
articles.title: Putin meets with Syria's Assad with the Middle East on edge
articles.description: Putin also visited Russian forces in Syria as the region awaits the next step in the U.S.-Iran showdown.
articles.content:
The meeting comes amid a crisis atmosphere in the region after a U.S. airstrike last week killed Iranian Quds Force commander Maj. Gen. Qasem Soleimani. Iran has vowed to strike back.
Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov did not specify that Iran come up in Putin… [+1733 chars]

articles.title: Why Democrats need to stop debating Medicare-for-all
articles.description: Democrats should spend more time denouncing Trump's ACA repeal efforts.
articles.content:
The Kaiser Family Foundation reminds us that the ACA is hanging by a legal thread:
